Name: Animal Healthbar Module
Description: Animal Healthbar Module General Category Modules Description A fast way to view the health of your prey, or your enemies Flavor Text Remember to keep an eye on your own health bar too Attributes Can see Creature Alert Level and Health Crafting Research Cost 75 25 Crafting Cost 50 10 Prerequisite Mass Dampener Module
